attributes.action: have all cars that are 25 years and older and not fitted with catalytic converters and over to be scrapped
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the modern vehicle is fitted with electronic fuel injection and catalytic converters to reduce its co emisions and under government legislation are charged road tax according to those emision stated on the vehicle document, yet i remmeber  the government allowing cars over 25 years old to be excempt from tax, yet cars over 25 years old produce stupid amounts of co emisions, so i would like the prime minister to have all cars over 25 years old and not fitted with a catalytic converter to be scrapped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
